snippet: The National Labor Relations Board wants to streamline the unionizing process, but is encountering resistance from business owners.
abstract: National Labor Relations Board proposes rules that would allow unions to hold workplace elections more quickly; it is encountering resistance from business groups.
lead_paragraph: The National Labor Relations Board wants to streamline the unionizing process, but is encountering resistance from business owners.

headline.main: Labor Board Tries Again on Unions’ Voting Rules
headline.print_headline: Labor Board Tries Again on Unions’ Voting Rules
